name: CompareGithubCommits
description:
Compares two commits in a GitHub repository.

Use this tool to compare two commits in a GitHub repository, including those in different branches or forks. Returns details about file changes, commit order, and signature verification status. Useful for understanding code changes and repository history.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The username of the account that owns the repository. This name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub repository to compare commits in. This input is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: base_and_head_branch_comparison
parameters.description: Specify branches/base and head in the format `BASE...HEAD` or `USERNAME:BASE...USERNAME:HEAD` to compare them.

value_schema.description: The base branch and head branch to compare. This parameter expects the format `BASE...HEAD`. Both must be branch names in `repo`. To compare with a branch that exists in a different repository in the same network as `repo`, the `basehead` parameter expects the format `USERNAME:BASE...USERNAME:HEAD`.

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: Page number of the results to fetch. Used for pagination to navigate through commit comparisons.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: Specifies the number of commit results returned per page. Maximum allowed is 100.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: basehead
parameters.description: The base branch and head branch to compare. This parameter expects the format `BASE...HEAD`. Both must be branch names in `repo`. To compare with a branch that exists in a different repository in the same network as `repo`, the `basehead` parameter expects the format `USERNAME:BASE...USERNAME:HEAD`.

value_schema.description: The base branch and head branch to compare. This parameter expects the format `BASE...HEAD`. Both must be branch names in `repo`. To compare with a branch that exists in a different repository in the same network as `repo`, the `basehead` parameter expects the format `USERNAME:BASE...USERNAME:HEAD`.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
